review: Could never get it to work with my wireless network, although my Apple TV works fine.  When it did occasionally connect and show the movie menu and I selected a movie to play, the movie only started and then failed with an error message.  BTW, I'm a computer person and software engineer who knows his way around a network - it was clear HOW to set it up, it just didn't work.  It only cost $20 so it's not really worth the trouble to send back to Amazon - they just got $20 from me that they get to keep.  Overall, Not ready for 'Prime' time.
